channel.title: Speaker settings are not remembered
channel.description:
Thought I'd throw this bug out there.
I like to play with headphones, so I set the speaker settings under the Audio tab to "Headphones". However, every time I start the game, it sets itself back to "2 Speakers", so I have to change it every time I launch the game.

item.title: Speaker settings are not remembered
item.dc:creator: NoPetrol
item.description:
This is the case with Half Life 2 as well.

I noticed this with the roll effect option. It is always reset to 3.5 whenever I start the game.
